definition: finger/to point at or to/to indicate or refer to/to depend on/to count on/(of hair) to stand on end

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

sentences.english: The Way of the Dragon God believes that the heart, more than anything else, points the way forward.
sentences.chinese: 龙神道相信指引方向的最大力量莫过于心。

sentences.english: In peripheral equipment sticked hang "homework manipulate guidance".
sentences.chinese: 在周边设备上贴挂“功课操纵指引”。

sentences.english: This has led to a more comprehensive neurobiological paradigm for the system of cognitive therapy.
sentences.chinese: 指引着认知治疗系统更全面的神经生物学范式。

sentences.english: You would just walk along that path, and it will get you there without effort.
sentences.chinese: 你只要沿着那条路，它将会指引你到达那里。

sentences.english: Listen to your heart for guidance.
sentences.chinese: 听从你的内心，以此为指引。

sentences.english: Guided by their sense of smell, they will return in a few years to  spawn.
sentences.chinese: 在其嗅觉的指引下，几年后它们会回到这里产卵。

sentences.english: In his heart a man plans his course, but the Lord determines his steps.
sentences.chinese: 人心筹算自己的道路，惟耶和华指引他的脚步。

sentences.english: The ideas of Marxism-Leninism point the way to victory.
sentences.chinese: 马克思列宁主义思想指引著通向胜利的道路。

sentences.english: Motivation provides learners with the impetus to create and sustain intentions and goal-seeking acts.
sentences.chinese: 动机是为学习者提供动力和指引方向的一系列因素。

sentences.english: Motivation Forces that energize, direct, and sustain a person's efforts.
sentences.chinese: 鼓舞，指引和维持个人努力行为的驱动力。

sentences.english: They will still ignite the innovation process.
sentences.chinese: 它们仍然指引着创新的全过程。

sentences.english: The results of the study can contribute to the promotion of breastfeeding.
sentences.chinese: 本研究结果可为提升母奶哺喂措施提供指引。

sentences.english: The nation looks to them for guidance .
sentences.chinese: 全国民众期待他们能够指引方向。

sentences.english: The European startup provides how-to guides in English and Spanish.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲人开始提供英语和西班牙语的指引指南。

sentences.english: You who travel with the wind, what weathervane shall direct your course?
sentences.chinese: 你是随风旅行的人，什么风向将会指引你该走了路呢？

sentences.english: The asterisk refers the reader to a footnote.
sentences.chinese: 星号指引读者去查阅脚注。

definition: to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
to guide/to give directions/to direct/to coach/guidance/tuition/CL:個|个[ge4]
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
mission/long-term task to which one devotes oneself/a calling
to look for/to seek/to find fault
